Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.model

Interface Substitution

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicSubstitution, ExplState, ImmutableValuation, MutablePartitionedValuation, MutableValuation, NestedSubstitution, ParamBinding, SmtLibValuation, Valuation
public interface Substitution
Interface for a substitution, which is a mapping from declarations to expressions.
